p: Fresh turmeric root and marigold leaves were collected locally, of good quality in size, shape, and color. After washing, the turmeric was skinned and cleaned frequently with fresh water. Turmeric was sliced and dried overnight in a hot air oven. Dry slices of turmeric were powdered manually, and the powder was then preserved in an airtight container. The marigold leaves were cleaned with fresh water and cut into small pieces. Then, it was made into a paste with the help of a mortar and pestle.
